info.title: marketplace

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name - (Required if login_type = s) - From social network

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: If it was passed, you can see other user profile

parameters.name: lat
parameters.description: current user latitude (required if search type = nearby)

parameters.name: long
parameters.description: current user longitude (required if search type = nearby)

parameters.name: transaction_id
parameters.description: passing if you want to delete 1 transaction
